Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes a housing succession rights task force
Summary: Establishes a housing succession rights task force to conduct a state-wide assessment of succession rights in rent stabilized, public housing and city or municipal owned buildings.
LawCode: Add ยง20-a, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to establishing a housing succession rights task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
